search.query: index="main" | eval DEALS = num_steps / 10 | stats sum(DEALS) as DEALS
index="main" | eval MCVALUATIONS = num_steps * num_sims | stats sum(MCVALUATIONS) as "MONTE CARLO VALUATIONS"

index="main" | eval epoch_submit_time = strptime(submit_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval epoch_start_time = strptime(start_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval epoch_end_time = strptime(onclient_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval epoch_exec_time = strptime(exec_time, "%H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval epoch_pending_time = epoch_start_time - epoch_submit_time | eval epoch_total_time = epoch_end_time - epoch_submit_time | stats SUM(num_steps) as NUM_STEPS, SUM(num_sims) as NUM_SIMS, AVG(epoch_total_time) as TOTAL_TIME, AVG(epoch_submit_time) as SUBMIT_TIME, AVG(epoch_pending_time) as PENDING_TIME, AVG(epoch_exec_time) as EXEC_TIME by portfolio_id | eval TASKS = NUM_STEPS * NUM_SIMS | eval TYPE = if(NUM_STEPS > 1, "COMPLEX", "SIMPLE") | eval TOTAL_TIME = strftime(TOTAL_TIME, "%H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval PENDING_TIME = strftime(PENDING_TIME, "%H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval EXEC_TIME = strftime(EXEC_TIME, "%H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval DATE = strftime(SUBMIT_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | rename portfolio_id as PORTFOLIO_ID | table DATE PORTFOLIO_ID TOTAL_TIME PENDING_TIME EXEC_TIME TASKS TYPE | sort by DATE
index=main | eval computeHost=split(worker, ",")| stats count as Total by computeHost
index=main portfolio_id=$tportfoliot$ | stats max(option_price) as price

index=main portfolio_id=$tportfoliot$ | rename paths{}.path_value{}.sub_path_id as sub_path_id, paths{}.path_value{}.sub_path_value as sub_path_value | eval aux=mvzip(sub_path_id, sub_path_value) | mvexpand aux | eval split = split(aux,",") | eval id=mvindex(split,0) | eval sub_id=mvindex(split,1) | eval value=mvindex(split,2) | table id, sub_id, value | chart first(value) over sub_id by id useother=false limit=0

index=main portfolio_id=$tportfoliot$ | rename paths_max{}.path_max_id as path_max_id, paths_max{}.value as path_max_value | eval aux=mvzip(path_max_id, path_max_value) | mvexpand aux | eval split = split(aux,",") | eval id=mvindex(split,0) | eval value=mvindex(split,1) | table id, value, portfolio_id | chart first(value) over id by portfolio_id useother=false limit=0
